welcome.info:
In many places in Scribe you can influence things with a right click. Also, there is often a small ( i ) that provides information about what you can do when hovering over it.

We would also be happy if you join our Discord community or support us on Patreon.

footer.text: New here? You can {create}, {library} or {register}. If you are feeling lost we also have a {tutorial} and a {readme} to cover all your questions.
